markdown:
Nenchuujes embody the fear of magic corrupted, gone wrong, or spiraling out of control with unintended consequences. A nenchuuj's eyes are like divination pools, showing visions of all the ways various spells can fail, backfire, or warp. The smell of burnt flesh and ozone hangs heavy around them. When they speak, corrupted magical energy pours from their mouths. Regions recovering from tremendous magical fallout, or where many novices in magical studies gather, may draw large numbers of nenchuujes. They like to lure spellcasters close by affecting a fear of magic, often feigning piteous distress or recoiling from simple spells, only to turn more powerful effects against a spellcaster's allies and relish the horror this produces. Nenchuujes denounce the spellcasters for being at fault in harming these allies, stoking feelings of regret. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 41 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 [Nenchuuj](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1023) **Source** [Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege](/Sources.aspx?ID=54) pg. 85 **Perception** +33; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) **Languages** [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Requian](/Languages.aspx?ID=34); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +33, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +39, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +33, [Dream Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +33, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +37, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +37, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +33 **Str** +5 **Dex** +8 **Con** +6 **Int** +10 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +8 --- **AC** 43 **Fort** +31 **Ref** +29 **Will** +37 +2 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 355 **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) **Weaknesses** good 15 **Easy to Call** The sahkil is considered 2 levels lower for the purposes of being summoned by rituals (such as [planar binding](/Rituals.aspx?ID=17)), but is always free to attack or leave instead of negotiate unless the primary caster's check is a critical success.
**Distort Magic** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) **Trigger** A creature targets the nenchuuj with a spell; **Effect** The nenchuuj warps the creature's magic, attempting an [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) check to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the spell. If successful, the nenchuuj can instead redirect the spell, as [_spell turning_](/Spells.aspx?ID=297), onto the caster or onto a different target within range from the caster. --- **Speed** 50 feet; [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6) **Melee** fist +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 4d8+13 bludgeoning plus 5d6 evil **Ranged** mindtwisting utterance +36 ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [range 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 4d12 mental plus 5d6 evil **Divine Innate Spells** DC 41 - **4th** [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110) (at will), [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [Nightmare](/Spells.aspx?ID=208) (at will) - **8th** [Mind Blank](/Spells.aspx?ID=192) - **9th** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (at will), [Weird](/Spells.aspx?ID=375) - **Constant (9th)** [Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mask of Terror](/Spells.aspx?ID=185) (see tainted backlash) **Tainted Backlash** A creature [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) by the sahkil's [_mask of terror_](/Spells.aspx?ID=185) is gripped with fear of the ways magic can go wrong. The creature is [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for as long as it is frightened. If the creature Casts a Spell during its turn, it can't reduce its frightened condition at the end of that turn. **Skip Between** ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156)) The sahkil can move itself between the [Ethereal Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=9) and the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1), as [_ethereal jaunt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=105), except that this ability has an unlimited duration and can be Dismissed.
name: Nenchuuj
